text: Tavira avarkaḷ nampikkai koṇṭavarkaḷaic cantittāl “nāṅkaḷum (uṅkaḷaippōl) nampikkai koṇṭu viṭṭōm'' eṉavum kūṟukiṟārkaḷ. Āṉāl, avarkaḷ (nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷai viṭṭu vilakit) taṅkaḷiṉ (talaivarkaḷākiya) ṣaittāṉkaḷuṭaṉ taṉittu viṭṭālō “niccayamāka nāṅkaḷ uṅkaḷuṭaṉtāṉ irukkiṟōm. Āṉāl, nāṅkaḷ (nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷaip) parikācam cey(yavē avvitam avarkaḷiṭam kūṟu)kiṟōm'' eṉak kūṟukiṉṟaṉar
